IkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=6c%2BArvwJyFVWWhW5HWvTfS90R%2F7fsH5h9Vk%2Fwn7E1jc%3D&reserved=0> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-7-min.png> 	

Policy Update: Enhancements to the Promotion Process

 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D124%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C825aec8a65c443031bee08dd3b97d750%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732245516711022%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=OOasqmKVHI%2BDqu3VgiF4Krt7a1wXP%2BLUNEn0C2Qxmx8%3D&reserved=0> 	

As part of our commitment to fostering a culture of transparency, development, and fairness, we are introducing updates to our Promotion Policy. These changes are designed to align with our values and support our collective growth.

Here are the key highlights:
- Stretch Assignments: Recognized as opportunities for personal growth and valuable team contributions, but not directly linked to promotions or changes in role responsibilities.
- Critical Role Successors: Identified successors will now participate in the interview process for critical roles, supporting their development and readiness for future opportunities.
- M3+ Promotions: Candidates aspiring to M3 level and above roles will be required to submit a case study, evaluated by a dedicated panel comprising the Line Manager, VP/Director - People, and Business Leader.

For the full details of the updated policy, please access it here.

Join Our Focus Groups to Shape HR on One Chalhoub 

Phase 2 of the One Chalhoub rollout is here, and we’re excited to bring HR features to the platform! Join us in virtual sessions the week of Feb 3rd to help shape a seamless and user-friendly experience. In these sessions, we invite you to share feedback on HR needs and challenges, review upcoming features, and collaborate on ideas. Sign up now <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D125%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C825aec8a65c443031bee08dd3b97d750%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732245516753359%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=bXVUbsXOb6lvngI8du5hcs4QcQhRxrUTUbnTkUjEA1w%3D&reserved=0> , we look forward to your valuable input!

 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D126%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C825aec8a65c443031bee08dd3b97d750%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732245516772095%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=H%2Fj7rvFfQ5%2FxVNHJg%2Ff9LeU8M6gbCF0z6TOAiZ1ur2Y%3D&reserved=0>

MAX MARA STAFF SALE

The Max Mara staff sale starts tomorrow on Max Mara, Weekend Max Mara & Marina Rinaldi with an additional 20% off on top of the current discounts! 
- Register using your Chalhoub Group email address
- Use the promo code: MM20 
- The sale will be available both in-store and online <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D127%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C825aec8a65c443031bee08dd3b97d750%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732245516785882%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=6g7pSFCKJGdyN8ywpY1Nonam0utU33xuhlN9aRi6mfE%3D&reserved=0>

Introducing Closer Apart by Ghawali
